entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 8:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
